backend/main.mo: Main canister logic managing user profiles, syllabus items, access control, and gamification state with migration support.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old gamification state to a new structure including coins and completedChapters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping requested features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files detailing their purpose and styling themes.
frontend/.env: Environment config defining deployment domain for development.
frontend/.env.production: Production environment config specifying the deployment domain.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind and OKLCH theme variable setup for light and dark mode with color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top‑level React component handling view navigation between landing, world map, realms, and boss fights.
frontend/src/components/AdventurePortalC: Card component for realm portals with neon styling, subject badges, and hover animations.
frontend/src/components/EarnedXpBadge.ts: Badge component displaying earned XP with glowing animated styling.
frontend/src/components/GamificationHead: Displays user gamification stats including level, XP progress, coins, streak, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/HallOfFameLeader: Shows a leaderboard dialog with ranked users, pulling XP and profile data and rendering rank icons.
frontend/src/components/PowerCard.tsx: Renders a stylized card with an image slice, title, description, optional icon, and optional action button.
Renders a rotating 3D geometric icon via react-three-fiber with locked and completed indicators.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGamificationQuerie: Provides queries and mutations for gamification state, leaderboard data, and boss fight completion.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity provider and hook for managing login, identity persistence, and status.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines syllabus-related queries and mutations for items, tasks, and status updates via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserQueries.ts: Fetches all user profiles by iterating over gamification states and querying each profile.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers, color variables, neon effects, utility classes, and animations for the app's visual theme.
frontend/src/lib/bossFights.ts: Provides predefined boss fight questions for science, maths, and SST with answers and explanations.
frontend/src/lib/confetti.ts: Implements a simple DOM‑based confetti animation for celebration effects.
frontend/src/lib/contentModel.ts: Defines subjects and chapters with metadata and exports structured chapter lists for science, maths, and SST.
frontend/src/lib/statusTheme.ts: Empty placeholder file for status theme logic.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, rendering the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/BossFight.tsx: Renders interactive boss fight quiz logic with scoring, subject-based styling, XP rewards, and completion UI.
frontend/src/pages/PortalHome.tsx: Displays the main portal landing page with hero visuals and a CTA to start the quest.
frontend/src/pages/PortalMaths.tsx: Shows the Maths realm portal with power cards and a boss fight CTA themed around the Infinity Dungeon.
frontend/src/pages/PortalScience.tsx: Science portal page showing themed PowerCards and a boss fight button for starting the Black Hole challenge.
frontend/src/pages/PortalSocialScience.t: Social science portal with historical/geography PowerCards and a boss fight CTA for artifact collection.
frontend/src/pages/RealmCivilizationQues: SST realm page listing kingdoms and chapters, showing completion state and allowing chapter selection.
Maths dungeon with 13 linear chapters, unlocking sequentially and showing completion status.
frontend/src/pages/RealmQuantumGalaxy.ts: Science realm showing planets and chapters, all unlocked, with selectable mission levels.
frontend/src/pages/WorldMapHub.tsx: World map hub offering entry into science, maths, or SST realms via styled interactive cards.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDomain.ts: Provides validation, sanitization, and fallback logic for deployment domain strings based on length and character rules.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based routing parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config defining dark-mode settings, custom colors, animations, and typography for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the app’s theme, required assets, architecture, and implemented features.
